website_summaries.verdict: This jacket has a hardshell exterior, but is also designed for  warmth.
pros: Lots of pockets including vertical exterior pockets for pens or tools
A nice winter jacket if you tend to get overheated
Really cuts out the wind effectively
cons: Not built for heavy duty warmth
You may still find yourself needing layers

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for your winter coat.
customer_reviews.text: Great coat and price! Coat feels about one half the weight of a carhart jacket. but performed better in wind protection in our first winter storm. No cold breeze sneaking in through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: RickyB

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was purchased for my husband who hates the cold, but has to work outside doing barn work and caring for horses at our boarding stable. My husband LOVES this jacket! He has been able to test it in the cold, wind, and rain and comments how warm and dry he is, and what a great job I did in buying this jacket for him. It enables him to move freely while working and is not bulky, yet still keeps him warm and dry. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Warm without being bulky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat for my husband to wear on our early spring trip to Iceland. He loved it! We experienced rain, wind, and snow, and he said it kept him warm. He liked all the pockets and found them to be useful, although a couple were too small to really keep much in. The jacket is water repellent and washed nicely upon our return home. It is a nylon outer. so it makes the usual "swishy" noise that nylon makes. It was not, however, bulky, which my husband liked. It met the product description and arrived well packaged and in a timely fashion. Recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Being a land surveyor it is important for me to have a jacket that is durable. This jacket is just that. The material is extremely resistant to tears. Walking through briars on the daily i have yet to get a tear in the jacket anywhere. The stitching is very strong and i have not had a single seam rip. It washes very easily. I get marking paint all over it, throw it in the wash. All gone, good as new. It isn't all that warm on it's own but i expected that. A thermal long sleeve and a sweatshirt along wity this jacket keep me warm and dry in the harsh Rhode Island winters. Very good product. Would recomend

product_meta.title: HARD LAND Men’s Winter Work Jacket Waterproof Hooded Insulated Coat Parka Outerwear
feature_bullets: 【ZIPPERS & FLY】Full front zip with chin guard. YKK zipper closure

【CONSTRUCTION】Tough 100% Nylon fabric with DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish repels moisture.Smooth inner face-fabric allows for easy layering. Synthetic insulation provides warmth with minimal weight and bulk.
【TECHNICAL FEATURES】Waterproof, windproof,abrasion resistant, breathable,insulated and durable winter work jacket.
【WARM HOODED WINTER COAT】Insulated hood with tall collar and adjustable hood drawcords provide more neck protection for added warmth and comfort.
【POCKET CONFIGURATION】One chest pocket with three pen pockets.Two hand pockets with snap and side-entry pockets. One internal zippered security pocket and one internal phone pocket.

【DESIGN & FIT】Regular fit provides freedom of movement with room for layers.Adjustable cuff with snap closure keep the wind out for more warmth. This winter coat is not only made for outdoor worker, but also suitable for snowboarding,snowmobile, riding, motorcycle,fishing, camping, mountain hiking, skiing, hunting and everyday jacket.
